thread.section_title: CarShop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.carshop.co.uk
thread.title: Gareth Messer

author: Gareth Messer
title: Gareth Messer
text:
Great experience. All the staff were friendly, explained in depth answers to any questions I asked. Couldn't fault the effort these guys went through either.
Shane Williams gave a detailed explaination when it came Ronny paperwork and also explained key points in great detail to make sure I understood.
Mitch Brewster was excellent when it came to my test drive and explaining the car functions which helped a lot.
